meanings.definition: A small, red berry commonly used in jams and sauces.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe lingonberry from the bush.
meanings.sent2: The lingonberry jam tasted delicious on my toast.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the last lingonberry from the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her lips were as red as a lingonberry, sweet and tempting.
meanings.sent5: The tangy flavor of the lingonberry lingered on my tongue.

meanings.definition: The low-growing shrub that produces the lingonberry.
meanings.sent1: The lingonberry bush was covered in bright red berries.
meanings.sent2: We planted a lingonberry in our garden to enjoy fresh berries.
meanings.sent3: The tiny lingonberry bush tried to hide behind the tall sunflowers.
meanings.sent4: The lingonberry bush stood out like a miniature forest in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the lingonberry bush filled the air with sweetness.
